title: Brand Positioning & Movement Building Interview
context: Extract your authentic perspectives, frustrations, and experiences to shape a movement-building content strategy. Rather than asking you to craft slogans or define your mission abstractly, we'll explore what you genuinely believe and have observed to discover the natural messaging that will resonate.

questions.base_question_text: What's something you see people in your industry saying or doing that genuinely frustrates you? What's wrong about it?
questions.research_objective: Identify the 'enemy' or 'villain' from authentic frustration - the myths, misconceptions, or bad practices you're fighting against

questions.base_question_text: What do you know from actually building things that most people talking online don't seem to understand?
questions.research_objective: Surface authentic expertise differentiators - the gap between your real knowledge and common misconceptions

questions.base_question_text: When you've changed someone's mind about something in your field, what was the moment they 'got it'? What shifted for them?
questions.research_objective: Discover natural 'worldview installation' moments from real conversations - what beliefs you're actually changing

questions.base_question_text: What's a belief you hold strongly that most people in your space would disagree with or find surprising?
questions.research_objective: Identify contrarian positioning that creates polarization and attracts the right people

questions.base_question_text: If someone who worked with you was recommending you to a friend, what would they say about you? How would they describe the experience?
questions.research_objective: Capture external perception and value articulation - how others naturally frame your work

questions.base_question_text: What phrases or ideas do you find yourself repeating often? Things you say in conversations, calls, or content that keep coming up?
questions.research_objective: Surface natural 'foundation phrases' and drumbeat messaging that already exists in your communication

questions.base_question_text: What's the transformation you want someone to go through after consuming your content or working with you over time? What should be different about how they think or act?
questions.research_objective: Define the 'victory' state - the new reality and identity shift you're engineering

questions.base_question_text: If you could get one message to stick in the heads of everyone in your target audience, what would it be? What truth do they need to internalize?
questions.research_objective: Distill the core worldview or belief that underlies all your content and positioning
